snippet: Felena Hanson noticed that most co-working spaces seemed to be dominated by men with tech companies. She opened Hera Hub, which she intends to franchise, to help women-owned businesses.
abstract: Felena Hanson noticed that most co-working spaces seemed to be dominated by men with tech companies. She opened Hera Hub, which she intends to franchise, to help women-owned businesses.

headline.main: After a Car Accident, an Entrepreneur Decides to Think Big
